extendedInfo.description: The Presidents app is designed to teach students about all the U.S. Presidents.The Study section will present various information about each President and Vice President including dates and fun facts. The Flashcards section will quickly allow a student to put a name to face and is presented in chronological order.The quizzes section will test a students knowledge in a fun, multiple choice, fashion. Students will be quizzed on:-President Names-Presidential Order-Presidential Facts-President by Party-Vice President Names-Vice Presidents by President(s) servedEach quiz is automatically graded at the end and results are presented to the student. This app is Ad supported.
